00133 #ifndef __TOMMYHASHDYN_H
00134 #define __TOMMYHASHDYN_H
00135 
00136 #include "tommyhash.h"
00137 
00138 /******************************************************************************/
00139 /* hashdyn */
00140 
00145 #define TOMMY_HASHDYN_BIT 4
00146 
00151 typedef tommy_node tommy_hashdyn_node;
00152 
00156 typedef struct tommy_hashdyn_struct {
00157         tommy_hashdyn_node** bucket; 
00158         unsigned bucket_bit; 
00159         unsigned bucket_max; 
00160         unsigned bucket_mask; 
00161         unsigned count; 
00162 } tommy_hashdyn;
00163 
00167 void tommy_hashdyn_init(tommy_hashdyn* hashdyn);
00168 
00172 void tommy_hashdyn_done(tommy_hashdyn* hashdyn);
00173 
00177 void tommy_hashdyn_insert(tommy_hashdyn* hashdyn, tommy_hashdyn_node* node, void* data, tommy_hash_t hash);
00178 
00191 void* tommy_hashdyn_remove(tommy_hashdyn* hashdyn, tommy_compare_func* cmp, const void* cmp_arg, tommy_hash_t hash);
00192 
00201 tommy_inline tommy_hashdyn_node* tommy_hashdyn_bucket(tommy_hashdyn* hashdyn, tommy_hash_t hash)
00202 {
00203         return hashdyn->bucket[hash & hashdyn->bucket_mask];
00204 }
00205 
00216 tommy_inline void* tommy_hashdyn_search(tommy_hashdyn* hashdyn, tommy_compare_func* cmp, const void* cmp_arg, tommy_hash_t hash)
00217 {
00218         tommy_hashdyn_node* i = tommy_hashdyn_bucket(hashdyn, hash);
00219         while (i) {
00220                 /* we first check if the hash matches, as in the same bucket we may have multiples hash values */
00221                 if (i->key == hash && cmp(cmp_arg, i->data) == 0)
00222                         return i->data;
00223                 i = i->next;
00224         }
00225         return 0;
00226 }
00227 
00233 void* tommy_hashdyn_remove_existing(tommy_hashdyn* hashdyn, tommy_hashdyn_node* node);
00234 
00238 tommy_inline unsigned tommy_hashdyn_count(tommy_hashdyn* hashdyn)
00239 {
00240         return hashdyn->count;
00241 }
00242 
00247 tommy_size_t tommy_hashdyn_memory_usage(tommy_hashdyn* hashdyn);
